title: A Baby for the Millionaire: The Full Series
description: This book contains all 3 books from the 'A Baby For The Millionaire' series and an excerpt from 'The Professor And The Nanny'.Jenny is a recent college grad who one night drunkenly applies for a job she is not qualified for with a fabricated resume. When she gets the job, she decides to see if she can play it off and due to a mistaken identity finds herself in the CEO's office.Hamilton Verona is rich and handsome and is not looking for any trouble but when Jenny walks into his office, he finds himself propositioning her for a position that could change her life.A position that could would find her doing things she had never ever dreamed of.'A Baby For The Millionaire' series is romantic and naughty. If you enjoy your romance with some spice, you will love this book! This is an erotic romance novella.
author: Helen    Cooper
